  • Constructor Details

    • GameFacadeController

      public GameFacadeController(main.labyrinth.models.game.GameFacade gameFacade)
      Constructs a GameFacadeController with the specified GameFacade.
      Parameters:
      gameFacade - : GameFacade instance to be used by the controller

  • Method Details

    • getCurrentPlayerPosition

      public main.labyrinth.models.geometry.Position getCurrentPlayerPosition()
      Retrieves the current position of the player in the labyrinth. This method delegates the call to the game facade to get the current player and then returns the player's current tile position.
      Returns:
      current Position object representing the player's coordinates on the gameboard

    • getCurrentPlayerObjective

      public String getCurrentPlayerObjective()
      Retrieves the current objective of the current player in the game. This method accesses the current player through the game facade and fetches their current objective card's associated treasure description.
      Returns:
      a String representing the description of the current player's objective in the format "Objectif actuel: [Treasure]", where [Treasure] is the name or identifier of the treasure on the card

    • notifyPlayerPosition

      public void notifyPlayerPosition(main.labyrinth.models.geometry.Position newPosition)
      Notifies the game facade about a change in the player's position. This method is responsible for updating all relevant observers with the new position of the player.
      Parameters:
      newPosition - : new Position object representing the player's updated coordinates on the game board

    • notifyPlayerObjective

      public void notifyPlayerObjective(int objective)
      Notifies the game facade about a change in the player's objective. This method is responsible for informing all relevant observers of the new objective assigned to the player.
      Parameters:
      objective - : the new objective index for the player, indicating which objective has been changed or advanced to. This integer represents the current state or progress of the player's objectives within the game.

    • nextPlayer

      public void nextPlayer()
      Advances the game to the next player. This method delegates the action to the GameFacade to update the current player to the subsequent player in the sequence. It typically cycles through all players, moving the turn to the next one and wrapping around to the first player if the end of the player list is reached. It ensures that the game continues smoothly from one turn to the next.

    • getCurrentPlayer

      public main.labyrinth.models.game.Player getCurrentPlayer()
      Retrieves the current player in the game.
      Returns:
      Player object representing the current player in the game
